file_content.text: I've spoken with the Mos Ila garrison. We won't be staying with the Mandalorians for long.
My lord. Have I mentioned how honored I am to be working with a Sith? No matter.
You made it back. I didn't have a moment of doubt.
I've already called the Mos Ila garrison--if you have the Gamorrean base codes, it won't be long before we can seize our new staging area.
Everything's going as planned, then.
Excellent.
I got what you wanted.
I thought the Diplomatic Service solved problems through diplomacy.
Aren't you a diplomat?
Our methods are flexible. Isn't that how it should be?
Soon, we won't have to play friends with the Mandalorians--and we'll be in a position to bargain.
It's been a privilege. Your part in this won't be forgotten.
With the Gamorrean base conquered, we won't need the Mandalorians anymore.
Of course, Commander. Our relations with your people are based on respect--not just credits. Your concerns will be addressed.
See that they are. Ret'urcye mhi.
My lord--Zola Arvannus, Diplomatic Service, on assignment to the Mandalorian settlement. I'd like a moment, if you please.
Sir! Zola Arvannus, Diplomatic Service, currently assigned to the Mandalorian settlement. If you have a moment, I'd like to file a request.
What've we here? I'm Zola Arvannus, Diplomatic Service, on assignment to the Mandalorian settlement. You and I should speak.
I assume this is about the Mandalorians?
I gather there's trouble.
[Flirt] Of course.
That's very flattering. A pity we have to discuss business.
Maybe later.
With due respect, this concerns our access to the desert. It may impact you.
If you want help writing a peace treaty, look somewhere else.
I don't deal with diplomats.
"Peace is a weapon." Admiral Patorr said that, if you recall.
The Mandalorians let us use their village as a staging area, but they're starting to resent our presence. It's time we moved on.
Not far from here, there's a bunker in the hands of Gamorrean raiders. Brutish deadly creatures, responsible for the massacre at the Vactooine mining colony.
But, if we had that bunker, we wouldn't need to share resources with the Mandalorians at all.
Your plan suffices. I will see it accomplished.
Very well.
It's an honor to hear you say that, my lord.
I'll clean the bunker with Gamorrean blood. Our troops can live in style.
Death and conquest. Fun.
That would be... very generous of you, my lord.
The Gamorreans--you're sure we can rout them?
Tell me about the opposition.
I can handle the bunker. Give me details.
Straightforward enough job.
Eliminate the Mandalorians and we can stay right here.
Why not take this village?
They wouldn't let us take the infrastructure intact. We need a base of operations, not a smoking crater.
I don't care.
Establishing a forward outpost is key to our Tatooine operations.
The Gamorreans will mount a stern defense, but if you can soften the opposition and bring me their base's computer codes, it'll be enough.
The Imperial garrison can complete the takeover. Leaving the Mandalorians to do what they will.
The Mandalorians have made us guests here. Let's respect that for now.
